name: Chakram Cycle
description:
A Fast Past, Unforgiving, Blast!

This lone warrior is stuck in an internal struggle of life, battle and death. Do you have what it takes to defeat the final boss and break the cycle!

Controls:

Movement: ASD

Jump: W or Space

Dash : Left Shift

Throw: Left Click

Credits:
